verses.verse: And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, who <S%H3318>brought<s%> thee out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage<s%>.
Thou shalt have no <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> before <S%H6440>me<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H6213>make<s%> unto thee a graven <S%H6459>image<s%>, nor any <S%H8544>likeness<s%> of any thing <S%H834>that<s%> is in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%>, or that is in the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H4325>beneath<s%>, or that is in the water under the <S%H776>earth<s%>:

thou shalt not bow <S%H7812>down<s%> thyself unto <S%H5647>them<s%>, nor serve <S%H3068>them<s%>; for I Jehovah thy <S%H430>God<s%> am a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H6485>visiting<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> upon the <S%H1121>children<s%>, upon the <S%H8029>third<s%> and upon the <S%H7256>fourth<s%> generation of them that hate <S%H8130>me<s%>,
and <S%H6213>showing<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> unto <S%H505>thousands<s%> of them that <S%H157>love<s%> me and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H7723>vain<s%>; for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will not hold him <S%H5352>guiltless<s%> that <S%H5375>taketh<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> in <S%H7723>vain<s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, to keep it <S%H6942>holy<s%>.
Six <S%H8337><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shalt thou <S%H5647>labor<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> all thy <S%H4399>work<s%>;

but the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>: in it thou shalt not <S%H6213>do<s%> any <S%H4399>work<s%>, <S%H1121>thou<s%>, nor thy son, nor thy <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, thy <S%H5650>man-servant<s%>, nor thy <S%H519>maid-servant<s%>, nor thy <S%H929>cattle<s%>, nor thy <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that is within thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>:

for in <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%>, the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and all that in them <S%H5117>is<s%>, and rested the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>: wherefore <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, and hallowed <S%H6942>it<s%>.

Honor <S%H3513><s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%> and thy <S%H517>mother<s%>, that thy <S%H3117>days<s%> may be <S%H748>long<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> giveth <S%H5414>thee<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H7523>kill<s%>.
Thou shalt not commit <S%H5003>adultery<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H1589>steal<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H6030>bear<s%> <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> against thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H2530>covet<s%> thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, thou shalt not <S%H2530>covet<s%> thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>, nor his <S%H5650>man-servant<s%>, nor his <S%H519>maid-servant<s%>, nor his <S%H7794>ox<s%>, nor his <S%H2543>ass<s%>, nor anything that is thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s.

And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>perceived<s%> the <S%H6963>thunderings<s%>, and the <S%H3940>lightnings<s%>, and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%>, and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H6226>smoking<s%>: and when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H5128>it<s%>, they trembled, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>.
And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H1696>Speak<s%> thou with <S%H8085>us<s%>, and we will hear; but let not <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> with <S%H4191>us<s%>, lest we die.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> <S%H430>not<s%>: for God is <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5668>to<s%> <S%H5254>prove<s%> <S%H3374>you<s%>, and that his fear may be before <S%H6440>you<s%>, that ye sin <S%H2398>not<s%>.
And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>, and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> drew <S%H5066>near<s%> unto the thick <S%H6205>darkness<s%> where God <S%H430>was<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Thus thou shalt <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Ye yourselves have <S%H7200>seen<s%> that I have <S%H1696>talked<s%> with you from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.
Ye shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> other <S%H430>gods<s%> with <S%H3701>me<s%>; gods of silver, or <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, ye shall not make unto <S%H6213>you<s%>.

An <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H127>earth<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> unto <S%H2076>me<s%>, and shalt sacrifice thereon thy <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%>, and thy <S%H8002>peace-offerings<s%>, thy <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and thine <S%H1241>oxen<s%>: in every <S%H4725>place<s%> where I <S%H2142>record<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> I will <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee and I will bless <S%H1288>thee<s%>.

And if thou <S%H6213>make<s%> me an <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%>, thou shalt not <S%H1129>build<s%> it of hewn <S%H1496>stones<s%>; for if thou lift <S%H5130>up<s%> thy <S%H2719>tool<s%> upon <S%H2490>it<s%>, thou hast polluted it.
Neither shalt thou go <S%H5927>up<s%> by <S%H4609>steps<s%> unto mine <S%H4196>altar<s%>, that thy <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> be not uncovered <S%H1540>thereon<s%>.
